comments: Benefits section was confusing - had to ask HR to clarify HSA vs FSA
Good overview but org chart was wrong - showed people who left months ago
Way too long. Spent 2 hours on this. Could be 45 mins max
IT setup section was outdated - referenced old VPN that we don't use anymore
Liked the company values section but culture stuff felt generic
Benefits info was from 2022?? Had wrong dental provider listed
Security training link was broken. Had to google it myself
Org chart still showed the old CEO. Awkward.
First week schedule template was helpful but needs updating
'Rapid growth' messaging felt tone-deaf given the layoffs
Completely outdated. Asked my manager instead of using the deck
DEI section was good but ERG list was incomplete
IT checklist was actually useful. More of that please
Still talking about 'explosive growth' - read the room
Values section needs refresh - some of these feel outdated
Good structure but content is stale across the board
CEO video transcript was inspiring but referenced old 5-year plan
Would love more info on WFH policy and equipment stipend
Deck says 'over 2000 employees' - we're at like 1400 now
Needs a complete refresh. Most info is 2+ years old
